title: gold adc looking for clash team
body:
i will be using my silver smurf account IGN: Daddy ˆoˆ (copy and paste this)

Gold account is: Problem 

Able to hop onto main if needed to prove.

replies.body: Currently surfing forums to find a team, I'm a Top lane main and can play Jungle too. I'm currently Silver V but that's because I don't play comp much, I have a good win rate with normals though. http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Blazehhh Hit me up, maybe we can figure something out
